          <title>
            <string language="en">Frequency spectrum of a radio station</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frequenzspektrum einer Radiostation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectre de fréquence d'une station par radio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectrum da freqüência de uma estação de 
rádio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettro di frequenza di una stazione radiofonica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσμα συχνότητας ενός ραδιοσταθμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectro de la frecuencia de una estación de 
radio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph shows the frequency spectrum of a radio station. This can be used to calculate the bandwidth of the amplitude modulated signal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mw network</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude modulated signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude modulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">audio baseband</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bandwidth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carrier frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frequency spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio station</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt das Frequenzspektrum einer 
Radiostation. Dieses kann verwendet werden, um die Bandweite des
Umfang modulierten Signals zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique montre le spectre de fréquence 
d'une station par radio. Ceci peut être employé pour calculer 
la largeur de bande du signal modulé par amplitude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostra o spectrum da freqüência 
de uma estação de rádio. Isto pode ser usado calcular a 
largura de faixa do sinal modulado amplitude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico mostra lo spettro di frequenza di 
una stazione radiofonica. Ciò può essere usata per calcolare 
la larghezza di banda del segnale modulato ampiezza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει φάσμα συχνότητας 
ενός ραδιοσταθμού. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να 
υπολογίσει το εύρος ζώνης του διαμορφωμένου εύρος σήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra el espectro de la 
frecuencia de una estación de radio. Esto se puede utilizar 
para calcular la anchura de banda de la señal modulada amplitud.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mw Netz</string>
          </keyword>
